title: Tasty Chicken Bread Recipe
content:
Delicious and soft chicken bread which tastes so yummy and is perfect for this iftar season. Make this for your kids then will love it for sure.

This was on my bucket list for quite some time, finally, I made it a few weeks back. I had a bunch of herbs, so used those to make this dough and it was perfect. You can make this in different shapes. 

I made this herbed dough and the filling was little creamy and spicy which tasted great. I will soon share an Indian version of a filling.

 

Chicken Bread Recipe

Prep time: 15 mins

Cook time: 20 mins

Total time: 35 mins

 

Recipe type: Brunch

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

FOR DOUGH:

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - 2 cups

Dry Yeast - 1.5 teaspoon

Sugar - 1 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Dried Parsley - 1 tablespoon

Dried Oregano - 2 teaspoons

Red Chilli Flakes - 2 teaspoons

Olive Oil - 2 tablespoons

Warm Water as needed

Milk - 2 tablespoons for brushing on top

 

FOR FILLING:

Oil - 1 tablespoon

Onion - 1 large chopped finely

Green Chillies - 2 chopped finely

Curry leaves a sprig

Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tablespoon

Chicken Breast - 2 cooked and cut into small pieces

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Chilli Powder - 1 teaspoon

Garam Masala Powder - 1 teaspoon

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - 1 tablespoon

Chicken Stock - ½ cup

 

Instructions

Take yeast, sugar in a bowl and add in warm water. Let it sit for 5 mins.

Take flour, salt, all the herbs and olive oil. Mix well.

Add yeast water and extra water and knead to a soft dough.

Add more oil on top and set aside to rise for 1 to 2 hours.

While the dough is rising. Make the filling. Heat oil in a pan,

Add in onion, curry leaves, ginger-garlic paste and green chillies. Saute for 2 mins.

Add salt and spice powders and mix well.

Add in all-purpose flour and saute for a min.

Add in Chicken stock and cooked chicken and mix well. Set aside to cool.

Once the dough has risen. Punch out the air and divide it into 2 portions.

Take a portion and roll into a large rectangle. Spoon filling inside and seal from the sides.

Now place it in a parchment-lined baking pan.

Let it rise for 30 mins to 1 hour.

In the last 10 mins of rising, preheat oven to 200 degrees C.

Now brush the top with egg or milk. Bake for 20 mins.

Remove and cool a little.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
